segments.text: It's your turn , sir.Sorry to keep you waiting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you want your hair cut ? Any particular way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd just like a trim and don't make it too short .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A little trimming , please.Trim a little more above the ears .
segments.speaker: S2
